description: Skadarlija is a vintage street and urban neighborhood in Belgrade's Stari Grad (Old Town) municipality, known as the main bohemian quarter of Belgrade, similar to Montmartre in Paris. After Kalemegdan, it is the second-most visited tourist attraction in Belgrade.

history.origins: Skadarlija dates back to the 1830s and was initially inhabited by Gypsies.
history.1850s: Started attracting artists and caterers and became a haven for the bohemian sector
history.1901: Began to acquire its bohemian character particularly after the well-known Dardaneli inn was demolished and its guests, prominent writers and actors, moved to the Skadarlija inns or kafanas.
history.early_20th_century: Well-known but mostly poor poets and writers became regular visitors
history.1967: Protected by law as a spatial cultural-historical unit

characteristics.street: Cobblestone (kaldrma) promenade paved in old-Belgrade style
characteristics.atmosphere: Authentic bohemian ambiance with vintage charm
characteristics.comparison: Often referred to as 'the Montmartre of Belgrade'
characteristics.cobblestone: Only remaining cobblestone street in Belgrade in original old-city style

restaurants_and_dining.cuisine: Typical national cuisine, most notably roštilj (grilled meat) with pivo (beer)

iconic_restaurants.Dva Jelena: Traditional restaurant serving customers for over a century
iconic_restaurants.Tri Šešira: Three Hats, a Belgrade institution since 1864, best encapsulates the Bohemian magic of Skadarlija

restaurants_and_dining.experience: Live traditional Serbian music, authentic atmosphere, local specialties

cultural_significance.twinning: Skadarlija and Parisian Montmartre twinned on 22 October 1977, celebrating their shared bohemian heritage
cultural_significance.preservation: Carefully preserved historic character with original cobblestones and architecture
cultural_significance.attractions: Cafés, restaurants, art exhibits, and authentic bohemian atmosphere

visitor_experience.activities: Dining at traditional restaurants, enjoying live music, art gallery visits, evening strolls
visitor_experience.best_time: Evening hours for authentic bohemian experience with live music

interesting_facts: Second-most visited tourist attraction in Belgrade after Kalemegdan
Sister city to Montmartre in Paris since 1977
Only street in Belgrade retaining original cobblestone paving
Home to restaurants that have been operating for over 150 years
